scripts.test:run: TZ=Europe/Berlin cypress run  --project test --browser chrome --config video=false
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles lib/**/*.*js lib/**/*.d.ts README.md package.json dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && tsc && cd dist/ && npm run clean-package-json
scripts.runner:copy-files: cd runner && npx copyfiles cypress/**/*.* cypress/*.* package.json cypress.config.js dist/ && npx copyfiles --flat ../lib/commands/{c8yclient,administration,utils,request,login}*.* dist/cypress/commands/ && npx copyfiles --flat ../lib/pacts/**/*.* dist/cypress/pacts && npx copyfiles --flat ../lib/plugin/*.* dist/cypress/plugin
scripts.runner:build: npm run clean && npm run runner:copy-files
scripts.runner:docker: npm run runner:build && cd runner && docker build --platform linux/arm64 -t c8ypact-runner .
scripts.clean-package-json: npm pkg delete 'devDependencies' && npm pkg delete 'scripts'
